summary: The sprint planning architect discusses options for handling the non-code DEV-001 task, proposing against direct conversion to a full user story and suggesting reclassification as US-016 with an automated setup script, or skipping it to prioritize core MVP items like SP-001.

actions.task: Decide on DEV-001: reclassify to US-016 (with architect drafting details), remove it, or leave as-is and proceed to approve SP-001

risks.risk: Keeping DEV-001 as a non-standard DEV task deviates from typical story types and risks it being overlooked or blocking clean sprints
risks.mitigation: Reclassify as a lightweight user story like US-016 with a code element, or remove it entirely to focus on core deliverables
